executable.title: Dose Volume Histogram (DVH) Export
executable.contributor: Please direct questions or suggestions to http://groups.google.com/group/plastimatch
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this project has been provided by NIH 2-U54-EB005149 (NA-MIC), NIH/NCI 6-PO1 CA 21239, the Federal share of program income earned by MGH on C06CA059267, and the Progetto Rocca Foundation, a collaboration between MIT and Politecnico di Milano.

image.name: input_ss_image
image.label: Structure set image (input)
image.description: Structure set image used to create the DVH

image.name: input_dose_image
image.label: Dose image (input)
image.description: Dose image used to create the DVH

file.name: output_dvh_filename
file.label: DVH file (output, csv)
file.description: CSV file that DVH is saved to
